name: Topham v. Potter Title & Trust Company, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Topham v. Potter Title & Trust Co.

judges: Before Kephart, C. J., Drew, Linn and Stern, JJ.
parties: Topham v. Potter Title & Trust Company, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
Affirmed on the opinions in Osterling v. Com. Trust Co., 320 Pa. 67, and Roberts’s Trust Estate, 316 Pa. 545.
Judgment affirmed.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: W. W. Stoner and J. M. Stoner & Sons, for appellee, were not heard..
casebody.head_matter:
Topham v. Potter Title & Trust Company, Appellant.
Argued October 12, 1936.
Before Kephart, C. J., Drew, Linn and Stern, JJ.
Howard Zacharias, for appellant.
W. W. Stoner and J. M. Stoner & Sons, for appellee, were not heard..
November 23, 1936:
